long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find colleagues by relevant skills with FlairIQ!
Effortlessly connect profiles to the FlairIQ database and search for team members based on their expertise. Powered by advanced AI technology.

Struggling to locate colleagues with the right skills for a project? FlairIQ makes it easy to find the perfect match by allowing you to search your team’s profiles, automatically connected to the FlairIQ database. Whether you’re looking for expertise in a specific area or simply want to discover more about your team’s capabilities, FlairIQ is the solution.

Key Features

	•	Instant LinkedIn Profile Connection
With one click, connect detailed LinkedIn profiles—including skills, job history, and qualifications—to the FlairIQ database to build a comprehensive, searchable repository of your team’s professional data.
	•	Automated Data Storage
FlairIQ automates the process of storing profile data, ensuring you have quick access to up-to-date professional information about your colleagues.

Benefits

	•	Centralized Profile Database
Have all professional details and skills of your team members stored in one place, making it easy to search, access, and manage relevant information.
	•	Time-Saving Automation
FlairIQ removes the need for manual data entry, allowing you to focus on utilizing your team’s expertise rather than spending time collecting data.

Installation and Setup

Installation Process:

	1.	Click ‘Add to Chrome’ to install FlairIQ.
	2.	Pin the extension to your toolbar for easy access.

Setup Steps:

	1.	After installing, you can immediately start connecting LinkedIn profiles to the FlairIQ database.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

	1.	What is the main feature of FlairIQ?
FlairIQ’s main feature is its ability to help you find colleagues based on relevant skills by connecting and organizing profiles in the FlairIQ database.
	2.	How does FlairIQ help improve team collaboration?
FlairIQ makes it easy to find team members with the right skills, enabling better collaboration by connecting the right people to the right tasks.
	3.	Is my data secure?
Absolutely. FlairIQ uses encryption and secure methods to protect all connected LinkedIn profile data stored in the database.

FlairIQ revolutionizes how you manage and search for skills in your team by connecting profiles and allowing easy skill-based searches. Save time and ensure you’re working with the right expertise today!
